title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Build resilient SaaS: multi-account resilience testing patterns (ISV404)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 构建弹性SaaS：多账户弹性测试模式 (ISV404)
abstract: Enterprise SaaS providers face increasing pressure to maintain high availability while preventing failures from spreading across tenant boundaries. Learn how leading ISVs use AWS Fault Injection Service to validate their multi-tenant architecture's resilience through controlled reslience testing experiments. We'll explore real-world examples from Security and HR tech providers who test cross-account failure scenarios while maintaining strict tenant isolation. Discover patterns for implementing resilience testing that strengthen your SaaS architecture without risking customer availability.
abstract_cn: 企业SaaS提供商面临着越来越大的压力，需要在维持高可用性的同时防止故障跨租户边界传播。了解领先的ISV如何使用AWS故障注入服务通过受控的弹性测试实验来验证其多租户架构的弹性。我们将探讨来自安全和HR技术提供商的真实案例，他们在保持严格租户隔离的同时测试跨账户故障场景。发现实施弹性测试的模式，在不影响客户可用性的情况下增强您的SaaS架构。
